author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Posera Announces Q1 2018 Financial Results
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Posera Ltd:
* POSERA ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 REVENUE C$2.742 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
